sentences.en: He lay senseless out in the rain.
sentences.cn: 他毫无知觉地躺在雨中.
他救醒了那个失去知觉的小孩.

sentences.en: Her death seemed such a senseless waste of life.
sentences.cn: 她的死真是无谓地浪费生命。

sentences.en: His dreams were senseless and inchoate.
sentences.cn: 他的梦想根本行不通，很不成熟。

sentences.en: I gave one for his nob and he fell senseless.
sentences.cn: 我给他当头一击,他就昏倒了.

sentences.en: It's about time we called a halt to all this senseless arguing.
sentences.cn: 现在正是我们停止一切无谓争论的时候了.

sentences.en: It's senseless to get angry over such a trifle.
sentences.cn: 不值得为这点小事惹气.

sentences.en: Sept and Josef carried the senseless king into a cellar.
sentences.cn: 萨普特和约瑟夫把昏迷不醒的国王抬到地下室去.

sentences.en: She was doing an absolutely wild, inhuman, senseless thing.
sentences.cn: 她在做极端疯狂的 、 不人道的 、 愚蠢的事情.

sentences.en: The branch of a tree knocked one of the horsewomen senseless.
sentences.cn: 一根树枝撞得一名女骑手昏了过去.

sentences.en: The thugs beat him senseless with a baseball bat.
sentences.cn: 暴徒用棒球棒把他打得失去了知觉.

sentences.en: Then I saw my boy lying senseless on the floor.
sentences.cn: 然后我看见儿子人事不知地躺在地板上。

sentences.en: They had asked her one question after another, and indeed had knocked her senseless.
sentences.cn: 他们接二连三地向她发问, 确实把她搞得有点晕头转向.

sentences.en: They were knocked to the ground, beaten senseless and robbed of their wallets.
sentences.cn: 他们遭重拳击倒在地，被打得不省人事，钱包也被抢走了。

sentences.en: What a senseless fellow he is!
sentences.cn: 他是个多么愚蠢的人 啊 !

words.tran_cn: 明智的；明显的；意识到的；通晓事理的
感觉的；知觉的；传递感觉的
毫无知觉地；无意识地；不省人事地
感觉，官能；观念；道理；理智
可感觉到的东西；敏感的人

trans.tran_cn: 无知的，愚蠢的，无意义的，无感觉的
trans.tran_en: happening or done for no good reason or with no purpose
